content: 2024 Singaporean comedy-drama film ***Fat Hope*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 超磅名模) is a yet-to-be-released Singaporean [comedy-drama](/wiki/Comedy_drama) film directed by Joyce Lee. It stars [Alien Huang](/wiki/Alien_Huang), Lin Yu-pin and [Liu Lingling](/wiki/Liu_Lingling_(Singaporean_host)). Although it was initially announced that the film will open in Singapore cinemas on 8 February 2024, it was eventually withdrawn at the eleventh hour. ## Synopsis An aloof runway supermodel turns overweight after being cursed and must find ways to lose weight to save her career. ## Cast - [Alien Huang](/wiki/Alien_Huang) as Nathan - Lin Yu-pin as Alisa - [Liu Lingling](/wiki/Liu_Lingling_(Singaporean_host)) - [Quan Yi Fong](/wiki/Quan_Yi_Fong) - Sonia Chew - [Hong Huifang](/wiki/Hong_Huifang) - Wang Lei - [Henry Thia](/wiki/Henry_Thia) - [Jeffrey Xu](/wiki/Jeffrey_Xu) - Xixi Lim - Abigail Chay ## Production and release [Principal photography](/wiki/Principal_photography) commenced in 2018, with post-production [audio mixing](/wiki/Audio_mixing) work done in [Thailand](/wiki/Thailand). Originally intended to play in theatres in 2020, the film's release was delayed several times due to the [COVID-19 pandemic](/wiki/COVID-19_pandemic), lead actor [Alien Huang](/wiki/Alien_Huang)’s death in September 2020 and production problems. In early September 2023, it was announced that the film will be released on 8 February 2024 in Singapore, during the [Chinese New Year](/wiki/Chinese_New_Year) holidays. But however, it was still withdrawn at the last minute. - *Fat Hope* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - *Fat Hope* on [Facebook](/wiki/Facebook_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about a 2020s comedy-drama film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
title: Fat Hope
